title: Servicenow | IC2 | Hyderabad
content:
Education: MCA from NIT
Years of Experience: 4+ yrs

Current Company: Netcracker Technology 
Current Compensation: 14LPA

Company: ServiceNow
Title/Level: Software Engineer(IC2)
Location: Hyderabad
Base Salary: Rs.24,80,000(Including  Employer PF)
Relocation: 20,000
Joining Bonus: NA
Stock Bonus: $36000(4year vesting schedule)

1st Year Salary: ~32LPA
Other Benefits: Standard Servicenow benefits.

I happily accepted the offer.
